title: Small Lamp
period: Roman Period to Late Antique Period
description:
Very light tan pottery lamp preserving no traces of slip or glaze. On the bottom is incised an inscription. The top is decorated in raised relief which can be interpreted either as an animal's head protruding from a frame or as a crowned head with plaited locks.
Condition: Surface is chipped. Brown stains around spout and on base.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
